Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two students using a string telephone to represent people communicating over a distance.
The student can include the string and cups in the drawing to show the materials used for the telephone device.
The student can label how sound travels through the string to communicate between the students.
The student can show that the device uses sound as a method to send information.
The student can illustrate the importance of communication over long distances by including a scenario or setting in their drawing.
